subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Women
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights flustered Connecticut into making 23 turnovers, and rallied from a 21-5 deficit to make it a close game.
snippet: The Scarlet Knights flustered Connecticut into making 23 turnovers, and rallied from a 21-5 deficit to make it a close game.
